]]> Comment on How to get rid of burn scars and marks at home by Margarita Bakshta http://www.thehealthsite.com/beauty/8-home-remedies-to-get-rid-of-burn-scarsmarks/comment-page-3/#comment-220590 Tue, 04 Aug 2015 04:18:00 +0000 http://health.india.com/?p=48626#comment-220590 My daughter’s face got scraped with a fingernail and after the scab had
